attributes.name: Mark of Suppression
attributes.name_with_affixes: Mark of Suppression of the Sentry
attributes.description: "Less of a warning for the wearer as it is for those who have the misfortune of seeing it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Less of a warning for the wearer as it is for those who have the misfortune of seeing it."

attributes.name: Mascot of the Dawn
attributes.name_with_affixes: Mascot of the Dawn

attributes.name: Mask by Karbetha
attributes.name_with_affixes: Mask by Karbetha
attributes.description: The artist who painted this mask is quite popular on this forsaken island.
attributes.parsed_description: The artist who painted this mask is quite popular on this forsaken island.

attributes.name: Mask of the Demon
attributes.name_with_affixes: Mask of the Demon
attributes.description: "Buried in the darkest souls, heart both burning and chilling cold, waits the demon with cunning bold."
attributes.parsed_description: "Buried in the darkest souls, heart both burning and chilling cold, waits the demon with cunning bold."

attributes.name: Masquerade Mask
attributes.name_with_affixes: Reinforced Masquerade Mask of the Scholar
attributes.description: A simple but fun wooden mask.
attributes.parsed_description: A simple but fun wooden mask.

attributes.name: Memory of Alec
attributes.name_with_affixes: Memory of Alec
attributes.description: "Wearing this invokes a feeling of never being full, of always needing something more."
attributes.parsed_description: "Wearing this invokes a feeling of never being full, of always needing something more."

attributes.name: Memory of Antonio
attributes.name_with_affixes: Memory of Antonio
attributes.description: "Antonio's life was filled with so many adventures. Sadly, none were etched into this ring."
attributes.parsed_description: "Antonio's life was filled with so many adventures. Sadly, none were etched into this ring."

attributes.name: Memory of Hazel
attributes.name_with_affixes: Memory of Hazel
attributes.description: "The memory of all the good works of Hazel swirls through this ring, giving the wearer a feeling of hope."
attributes.parsed_description: "The memory of all the good works of Hazel swirls through this ring, giving the wearer a feeling of hope."

attributes.name: Memory of Jason
attributes.name_with_affixes: Memory of Jason
attributes.description: "Jason had insisted on just one more trip out to sea. It was to prove his undoing, as he ended up on Aeternum."
attributes.parsed_description: "Jason had insisted on just one more trip out to sea. It was to prove his undoing, as he ended up on Aeternum."

attributes.name: Memory of Montore
attributes.name_with_affixes: Memory of Montore
attributes.description: "There are voices swirling around this ring, which you can almost make out. They hint at things you don't wish to think about."
attributes.parsed_description: "There are voices swirling around this ring, which you can almost make out. They hint at things you don't wish to think about."

attributes.name: Memory of Stephen
attributes.name_with_affixes: Memory of Stephen
attributes.description: "Stephen was never seen without this ring, though no one bothered to ask why while he was living."
attributes.parsed_description: "Stephen was never seen without this ring, though no one bothered to ask why while he was living."

attributes.name: Men of Arms Mascot
attributes.name_with_affixes: Men of Arms Mascot

attributes.name: Empty Gem Socket
attributes.parsed_description: An empty socket for a gem.
An empty socket for a gem.

attributes.name: Invigorated
attributes.parsed_description: Weaken, Disease, Exhaust, and Rend expires -3.0% faster.
Weaken, Disease, Exhaust, and Rend expires -4.8% faster.

attributes.name: Enfeebling Maelstrom
attributes.parsed_description: Targets hit by Maelstrom's No Reprieve are Weakened, reducing their attack damage by -3.0% for 4.0 seconds.
Targets hit by Maelstrom's No Reprieve are Weakened, reducing their attack damage by -13.9% for 4.0 seconds.

attributes.name: Stamina Recovery
attributes.parsed_description: When you are hit while below 50% gain 50.0 stamina (30.0s cooldown.) Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.
When you are hit while below 50% gain 73.6 stamina (44.2s cooldown.) Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.

attributes.name: Siphoning
attributes.parsed_description: You gain 1.0% mana per hit (cooldown 10s). Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.
You gain 2.1% mana per hit (cooldown 10s). Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.

attributes.name: Mortal Energy
attributes.parsed_description: When you kill something gain 5.0 Stamina. (5.0s cooldown.)
When you kill something gain 10.6 Stamina. (5.0s cooldown.)

attributes.name: Luck
attributes.parsed_description: +0.5% chance at rare items from chests and monsters.
+1.9% chance at rare items from chests and monsters.

attributes.name: Mana Recovery
attributes.parsed_description: When you are hit while below 50% gain 50.0 mana (60.0s cooldown.) Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.
When you are hit while below 50% gain 78.2 mana (93.8s cooldown.) Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.
